sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Suppose it is given that
\[
	\frac{c ^3 + 3 cd ^2 }{3c ^2 d + d ^3 } = \frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2}{3 i ^2 j + j ^3}
\]
Then prove that 
\[
	\frac{i }{c } = \frac{j }{d }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that
\[
	\frac{c ^3 + 3 cd ^2 }{3c ^2 d + d ^3 } = \frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2}{3 i ^2 j + j ^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo rule on both sides of the equation, we get
\begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{c ^3 + 3 c\input[s2v1]{} ^2 + 3c ^2 d + d ^3 }{c ^3 + 3 cd ^2 - 3c ^2 d - d ^3 } = \\
	\frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 + 3 i ^2 j + j ^3}{i ^3 + 3 i\input[s2v2]{} ^2 - 3 i ^2 j - j ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{(c + \input[s3v1]{} )^3}{(\input[s3v2]{} - d )^3} = \frac{(i + j )^3}{(i - j )^3}
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{c + d }{c - \input[s4v1]{} } = \frac{i + \input[s4v2]{} }{i - j }
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
Now apply componendo and dividendo on both sides of the equation again.
\[
	\frac{c }{\input[s5v1]{} } = \frac{\input[s5v2]{} }{j }
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{i }{\input[s6v1]{} } = \frac{j }{\input[s6v2]{} }
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": ["d", "j"], "text": "Componendo and dividendo rule on the given equation will result in \begin{multline}\notag
	\\ \frac{c ^3 + 3 cd ^2 + 3c ^2 d + d ^3 }{c ^3 + 3 cd ^2 - 3c ^2 d - d ^3 } = \\
	\frac{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 + 3 i ^2 j + j ^3}{i ^3 + 3 ij ^2 - 3 i ^2 j - j ^3} 
\end{multline}"}, {"data": ["d", "c"], "text": "$$\text{The previous equation can also be written as $\frac{(c + d )^3}{(c - d )^3} = \frac{(i + j )^3}{(i - j )^3}$, as $(a+b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 + 3a^2b + b^3$ and $(a-b)^3 = a^3 + 3ab^2 - 3a^2b - b^3$, for any $a$ and $b$.}$$"}, {"data": ["d", "j"], "text": "$$\text{Upon taking cube root on both sides we get $\frac{c + d }{c - d } = \frac{i + j }{i - j }$}$$"}, {"data": ["d", "i"], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo we get $\frac{c }{d } = \frac{i }{j }$}$$"}, {"data": ["c", "d"], "text": "$$\text{Multiplying both sides by $\frac{j}{c}$, we get $\frac{i }{c } = \frac{j }{d }$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
